skills.name: AI Researcher
skills.description: Automated skill to gather and summarize AI news and trends from various sources (Google Trends, RSS).
examples: What's happening in AI this week?
context_hints: user asks about AI news or trends
user wants industry updates
user mentions research or monitoring AI landscape

skills.name: Artifact Sync
skills.description: Sync AI-generated artifacts (plans, tasks, walkthroughs) to Obsidian with intuitive naming. Use when user says "sync artifact", "save plan", or "copy to vault".
examples: Save this implementation plan to my notes
Copy this task list to my vault
context_hints: user mentions saving or syncing AI-generated content
user references plans, tasks, or walkthroughs
user wants to preserve conversation artifacts
user mentions Obsidian vault

skills.name: Code Template Generator
skills.description: Generate production-ready code templates for data engineering tasks including Spark, SQL, dbt, Terraform, Docker, and ETL scripts
examples: Generate a Spark ETL job for BigQuery
Create a dbt model for customer dimensions
Create Docker Compose for local Spark cluster
context_hints: user needs boilerplate code for data engineering
user mentions Spark, SQL, dbt, Terraform, Docker
user asks for code generation or templates
user is doing DE Zoomcamp work

skills.name: Dev.to Publisher
skills.description: Publish blog posts to Dev.to from session logs and weekly summaries
examples: Create a blog post from my learning today
Write an article about BigQuery partitioning
context_hints: user mentions Dev.to or blogging
user wants to share their learning publicly
user mentions creating articles or posts
learning-in-public sharing request

skills.name: Environment Setup Helper
skills.description: Automate environment setup, dependency management, and validation for data engineering projects
examples: Create a virtual environment for this project
context_hints: user mentions environment setup or dependencies
user has installation or configuration issues
user mentions Docker, Terraform, or GCP setup
user starting a new module

skills.name: Excel Generator
skills.description: Create Excel spreadsheets with formulas, formatting, charts, and multi-sheet support
examples: Convert this CSV to Excel with charts
context_hints: user mentions Excel or spreadsheets
user wants data in tabular format
user needs reports or charts
user has data to organize

skills.name: File Organizer
skills.description: Organize and manage files with intelligent categorization, batch operations, and safety controls
examples: Organize my Downloads folder by type
Batch rename photos with date prefix
Clean up old files in this folder
context_hints: user mentions organizing or sorting files
user wants to clean up folders
user mentions duplicates or renaming
user references Downloads or messy folders

skills.name: GitHub Publisher
skills.description: Automatically publish session logs, skills, and learning content to appropriate GitHub repositories
examples: Push my changes to the learning-logs repo
context_hints: user mentions publishing or pushing to GitHub
user wants to share their work publicly
user mentions committing code or content
conversation involves learning-in-public workflows

skills.name: Linear Manager
skills.description: Manage Linear issues and projects - create tasks, track progress, sync with notes. Use when user says "create linear task", "track progress", or "setup module".
examples: Create a Linear task for the BigQuery homework
What tasks do I have this week?
Create an issue for fixing the sync bug
context_hints: user mentions Linear or project management
user wants to create or track tasks
user asks about their todo list or backlog
user mentions modules or homework tracking

skills.name: Notebook Manager
skills.description: Create, organize, and manage Jupyter notebooks with templates for data engineering tasks
context_hints: user mentions Jupyter or notebooks
user wants to explore or analyze data
user needs structured notebook templates
user is doing data engineering development

skills.name: Obsidian Linear Sync
skills.description: Sync tasks between Obsidian notes and Linear issues. Currently Obsidian→Linear. Use when user says "sync tasks", "add to linear", or "sync obsidian".
examples: Sync my daily tasks to Linear
Create Linear issues from my daily note
context_hints: user mentions Obsidian and Linear together
user has tasks in daily notes that need tracking
user mentions syncing or pushing tasks
user wants tasks from notes to appear in project management
user is starting their day and needs tasks in Linear

skills.name: Obsidian Manager
skills.description: Manage Obsidian vault notes via MCP - create, read, search notes and manage knowledge base
examples: Create a note about Spark partitioning
Search my vault for BigQuery notes
context_hints: user mentions Obsidian or note-taking
user wants to search their knowledge base
user asks to create or find notes
user references their vault

skills.name: Project Onboarder
skills.description: Automates new project setup - creates folder structure, git repo, Obsidian note, and Linear project
examples: Create a new project for my side quest
Set up a new project called ML Experiments
context_hints: user mentions starting or creating a new project
user wants consistent project structure
user mentions project scaffolding or setup

skills.name: Session Wrapper
skills.description: Automates "Learning-in-Public" session logs by aggregating Git activity, Linear tasks, and generating social-ready content. Use when user says "wrap session", "end session", or "log session".
examples: Create a session log for my BigQuery work
I'm done for today, log what I did
context_hints: user mentions finishing or ending work
user asks about summarizing recent activity
user mentions learning in public or content creation
user references Git commits or changes made
user wants to create social media posts about their work

skills.name: Web Scraper
skills.description: Extract data from websites using browser automation, with support for dynamic content and structured data collection
examples: Scrape product prices from this website
Get all links from this page
context_hints: user mentions web scraping or data extraction
user wants to get data from a website
user mentions crawling or collecting web data
user has a URL they want data from
